医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为什么肥胖但没有糖尿病的人开始服用索马鲁肽？研究确定了影响非糖尿病肥胖个体开始服用索马鲁肽的关键因素，揭示了保险覆盖范围的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Why-do-people-with-obesity-but-without-diabetes-start-take-semagluide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Why-do-people-with-obesity-but-without-diabetes-start-take-semagluide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4e231b8-e6fb-4045-88c2-91ec7f6b1ff2 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 14:29:00 -0500 Why do people with obesity, but without diabetes, start taking semaglutide?
近三分之一的美国人暴露于饮用水中不受管制的污染物研究人员评估了美国各地公共供水系统中存在的不受监管污染物暴露的社会经济差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Nearly-one-third-of-Americans-expose-to-unulated-contaminants-in-drinking-water.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Nearly-one-third-of-Americans-expose-to-unulated-contaminants-in-drinking-water.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c11aeae1-ca63-4e3b-b938-c18c94b4e802 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 13:18:00 -0500 Nearly one-third of Americans exposed to unregulated contaminants in drinking water
臭氧暴露可能导致氧气水平降低和动脉僵硬度根据美国学院旗舰期刊《JACC》今天发表的一项研究，接触臭氧 (O3) 可能会减少体内氧气的供应，由于身体自然反应会产生更多红细胞和血红蛋白，从而导致动脉硬化心脏病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Ozone-exposure-may-contribute-to-reduced-oxygen-levels-and-arterial-stiffness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Ozone-exposure-may-contribute-to-reduced-oxygen-levels-and-arterial-stiffness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df38ed62-900f-401e-9be1-69ad58e61015 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 11:23:32 -0500 Ozone exposure may contribute to reduced oxygen levels and arterial stiffness
研究发现与婴儿猝死综合症有关的血液特征弗吉尼亚大学医学院的新研究揭示了血液样本中婴儿猝死综合症的指纹，这可能为简单测试识别处于危险中的婴儿打开大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-uncovers-blood-signatures-linked-to-Sudden-Infant-Death-Syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-uncovers-blood-signatures-linked-to-Sudden-Infant-Death-Syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ce2556b-0c28-41ac-8aa1-9b823b4fa4fd Wed, 22 Jan 2025 11:19:13 -0500 Study uncovers blood signatures linked to Sudden Infant Death Syndrome
社会干预可能导致全国艾滋病毒发病率大幅下降马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校的研究人员量化了一系列社会因素对艾滋病毒传播的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Social-interventions-could-lead-to-major-drop-in-national-HIV-incidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Social-interventions-could-lead-to-major-drop-in-national-HIV-incidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73837f9e-6112-4b39-9784-82585c2206a7 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 11:14:39 -0500 Social interventions could lead to major drop in national HIV incidence
单剂量新药在乳腺癌模型中显示出肿瘤清除潜力尽管治疗取得了重大进展，乳腺癌仍然是女性癌症相关死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Single-dose-of-novel-drug-shows-tumor-clearing-potial-in-breast-cancer-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Single-dose-of-novel-drug-shows-tumor-clearing-potential-in-breast-cancer-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2325ae4-1c89-4a5c-ba7b-292eac68b8c1 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 10:53:34 -0500 Single dose of novel drug shows tumor-clearing potential in breast cancer models
儿童癫痫与迟发性脑淀粉样蛋白疾病有关来自芬兰图尔库大学和奥博学术大学以及美国威斯康星大学的研究人员证明，患有儿童癫痫症的人在以后的生活中脑淀粉样蛋白的积累增加，可能使他们容易患迟发性脑淀粉样蛋白疾病。例如阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Childhood-epilepsy-linked-to-late-onset-brain-amyloid-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Childhood-epilepsy-linked-to-late-onset-brain-amyloid-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c503cc1-8dcc-483c-abe9-34688a184109 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 10:47:00 -0500 Childhood epilepsy linked to late-onset brain amyloid disorders
印第安纳大学医学院、贝克曼库尔特生命科学公司获得 250 万美元拨款，以扩大非洲的白血病和淋巴瘤检测贝克曼库尔特和印第安纳大学获得了 250 万美元的赠款，用于扩大肯尼亚西部的白血病和淋巴瘤检测，促进早期诊断工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/2425-Million-Grant-Awarded-to-Indiana-University-School-of-Medicine-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-to-Expand-Leukemia-和-淋巴瘤-检测-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/2425-Million-Grant-Awarded-to-Indiana-University-School-of-Medicine-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-to-Expand-Leukemia-和-淋巴瘤-测试-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=285c6153-a807-4796-a06d-bde32b67197e Wed, 22 Jan 2025 08:30:00 -0500 $2.5 Million Grant Awarded to Indiana University School of Medicine, Beckman Coulter Life Sciences to Expand Leukemia and Lymphoma Testing in Africa
新设备有望实现平衡障碍的可靠康复巴斯克大学 (UPV/EHU) 推出了一种很有前途的设备，旨在在治疗中风、眩晕等后遗症时可靠且可重复地进行测量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-device-promises-reliable-rehabilitation-for-balance-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-device-promises-reliable-rehabilitation-for-balance-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4794ffd1-d45f-4759-85a9-12946a930a58 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 08:27:28 -0500 New device promises reliable rehabilitation for balance disorders
研究深入了解癌症治疗后衰老细胞如何存活用化疗和放疗治疗肿瘤后，会出现称为衰老细胞的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-offers-insight-into-how-senescent-cells-survive-after-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-offers-insight-into-how-senescent-cells-survive-after-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8071f80a-6470-411c-8d86-3461260e902e Wed, 22 Jan 2025 08:14:00 -0500 Study offers insight into how senescent cells survive after cancer treatment
